#header-multi-value-ebay
[![Dependency Status](https://nodevalid-i3ey5.vip.lvs01.dev.ebayc3.com/nodejs/header-multi-value-ebay.svg)](https://nodevalid-i3ey5.vip.lvs01.dev.ebayc3.com/nodejs/header-multi-value-ebay)

Header Multi Value Parameters Create and Parsing Module

## Changelog

See   [CHANGELOG.MD](https://github.corp.ebay.com/nodejs/header-multi-value-ebay/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#changelog)

# Installation

```Shell
npm install header-multi-value-ebay --save
```

# Usage

```Javascript
var multivalue = require('@ebay/header-multi-value-ebay');
var helloWorld = multivalue.create({'hello': 'world'}); /**Produces Hello=World**/
```

# API

## Create MultiValue

Creates a MultiValue object for the input.

```Javascript
var multivalue = require('@ebay/header-multi-value-ebay');
var helloWorld = multivalue.create({'hello': 'world'});
console.log(helloWorld.toString());/**Produces Hello=World**/
```

## Remove a key/value pair

```Javascript
var multivalue = require('@ebay/header-multi-value-ebay');
var hmv = multivalue.create({'hello': 'world', 'foo': 'bar'});
console.log(hmv.toString());/**Produces Hello=World,foo=bar**/

hmv.remove('foo');

console.log(hmv.toString());/**Produces Hello=World**/
```

## Parse MultiValue

Parse a MultiValue Object

```Javascript

var provider = require('@ebay/header-multi-value-ebay');
var helloWorld = provider.parse('Hello=World');
console.log(helloWorld.get('Hello')); // Prints World

```
